QuestData.Title: The Skull of Gul'dan
QuestData.Description: Illidan set out to find the Skull of Gul'dan. He fought through armies of demons to reach it, slaying them with the power that made him a hated outcast.$B$BSee him in battle, $c. Witness the one that fought the fiercest against the corruptors of Felwood, and struck at its source.
QuestData.LogDescription: Relive Illidan's battle for the Skull of Gul'dan.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Feronas Sindweller in Felwood.
QuestData.RewardText: Now you are beginning to see...
